meta-review.comment: Raccoo Venture brings back the nostalgic charm of 3D platformers from the 90s with a cute and visually appealing world. The gameplay offers fun environmental puzzles, but is marred by frustrating level design and uneven difficulty. Despite its shortcomings, the game's music and environment design shine through, creating an enjoyable if occasionally challenging experience. If you're willing to navigate the occasional rough patch, Raccoo Venture delivers a charming and engaging throwback to classic platforming adventures.
